metadata.synopsis: The default dialog that plays when interacting with the brain reading device/severed head in the lower Colony. Interacting with the severed head will yield no information, as it only serves to narrate memories from brain jars inserted into the device.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe MemLib_AllJars" to get all the brain jars and teleport to the Brain Reading Device.- In front of you will be a severed head. Talk to it without inserting a brain jar into the receptacle next to it, and it will give this dialogue.

0.speaker: Slack-Skinned Head
0.text:
... empty vessel ... nothing more...
... lending voice... to elder lore...
0.context: NodeContext: A severed head in which brains can be inserted in order to play out memories. This is its drooling default state, when no brain is inserted.
